about.title: About {{ProdFullName}} API
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is an advanced metadata fields management and manipulation solution to easily view, update, remove, find, compare, exchange and export metadata information from images and document formats without using any external software. Add metadata details to Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Outlook emails, OneNote, Visio, Project, PDF, AutoCAD, ZIp, Audio and Video file formats along with the support for working with many other metadata processing features.
